prompt:
TASK: Architectural Visualization - Generate a 3D RENDER from a 2D BLUEPRINT.

INPUT CONTEXT:
- The attached image is a 2D FLOOR PLAN / BLUEPRINT (Reference Map).
- It shows the furniture arrangement from above.

YOUR GOAL:
- Create a photorealistic 3D PERSPECTIVE VIEW from INSIDE the room.
- Imagine you are standing in the room (at the door), looking across at the furniture.
- Camera Height: Eye-level (5 feet / 1.5m).
- Camera Angle: Horizontal (NOT looking down).

STRICT CONSTRAINTS:
- DO NOT produce another map or top-down view.
- DO NOT produce an isometric view.
- The output must look like a real photograph taken by a person standing in the room.
- Use the furniture positions from the blueprint, but visualize them in 3D.

ROOM SPECIFICATIONS:
- Dimensions: approximately 2 x 2 feet
- Style: modern
- Lighting: natural daylight

FURNITURE LAYOUT (from the blueprint):
- table_1: Centered on and flush against the south wall, positioned between the two windows.
- chair_1: Placed at table_1 on the west side, with its back to the center of the room.
- chair_2: Placed at table_1 on the east side, with its back to the center of the room.
- bed_1: Positioned in the southeast corner, with the headboard flush against the east wall. This places the bed in the corner furthest from the entry door and the desk.
- nightstand_1: Placed against the east wall, on the north side of bed_1.
- nightstand_2: Placed between bed_1 and the south wall.
- sofa_1: Positioned flush against the west wall, in the area south of the kitchen fixtures. This keeps the central pathway to the desk clear.
- artwork_1: Mounted on the west wall, centered above sofa_1.
- artwork_2: Mounted on the east wall, centered above bed_1.
- plant_1: Placed in the southwest corner of the room, to the left of table_1.
- rug_1: Placed on the floor in front of the west-side window on the south wall, partially under table_1.
- rug_2: Placed on the floor in front of the east-side window on the south wall, partially under table_1.
- lamp_1: Placed on top of nightstand_1.
- lamp_2: Placed on top of nightstand_2.

CAMERA:
- View angle: corner of the room (standing at entrance looking in)
- Height: eye-level (approximately 5 feet)
- Show the full room layout matching the blueprint

QUALITY REQUIREMENTS:
- Photorealistic rendering quality
- Proper perspective and depth
- Realistic shadows and lighting
- Show furniture textures and materials
- Professional interior photography style

Generate a single high-quality interior photograph from an EYE-LEVEL perspective.
